    • Method Detail

      • addArchangel

        public void addArchangel(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String photo,
                         java.lang.String prayer,
                         java.lang.String power,
                         int month,
                         int day,
                         java.lang.String color,
                         int size,
                         java.lang.String essence,
                         double illuminanceDegree)
        This method creates and adds an archangel. It also receives and sends the information for the creation of a candle.
        post:An archangel is created and added to Legion's arrayList.
        Parameters:
        name. - A String containing the name of the archangel. Must end with "el".
        photo. - A String containing the url of the archangel's photo.
        prayer. - A String containing the prayer of the archangel.
        power. - A String containing the power of the archangel.
        month. - An integer representing the month of the celebration date. Must be between 1 and 12.
        day. - An integer representing the day of the celebration date. Must be between 1 and 31.
        color. - A String containing the color of the candle.
        size. - An integer representing the size of the candle.
        essence. - A String containing the aroma of the candle.
        illuminanceDegree. - A double representing the illuminance degree of the candle. Cannot be 0. Cannot be negative.

      • nameValidator

        public boolean nameValidator(java.lang.String name)
        This method checks if the name is valid for an archangel.
        Pre: name is a String. Post: The name is valid, boolean is true. The name is already taken, boolean is false. The name doesn't end with "el", furthermore is invalid. boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        name. - The name of the archangel that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if name's valid. False if name's invalid or already exists.

      • powerValidator

        public boolean powerValidator(java.lang.String power)
        This method checks if the power already exists.
        Pre: power is a String. Post: The power is not being used, boolean is true. The power is already taken, boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        power. - The power of the archangel that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if power's available. False if power's unavailable.

      • monthValidator

        public boolean monthValidator(int month)
        This method checks if the month is between 1 and 12.
        Pre: month is a natural integer. Post: The month's correct, boolean is true. The month's incorrect, boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        month. - The month number that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if month's correct. False if month's incorrect.

      • dayValidator

        public boolean dayValidator(int day)
        This method checks if the day is between 1 and 31.
        Pre: day is a natural integer. Post: The day's correct, boolean is true. The day's incorrect, boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        day. - The day number that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if day's correct. False if day's incorrect.

      • sizeValidator

        public boolean sizeValidator(int size)
        This method checks if the size is between 1 and 3.
        Pre: size is a natural integer. Post: The size's correct, boolean is true. The size's incorrect, boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        size. - The size number that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if size's correct. False if size's incorrect.

      • illuminanceValidator

        public boolean illuminanceValidator(double illuminanceDegree)
        This method checks if the illuminance degree is bigger than zero.
        Pre: illuminance degree is a rational integer. Post: The illuminance degree's correct, boolean is true. The illuminance degree's incorrect, boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        illuminanceDegree. - The illuminance degree that'll be checked.
        Returns:
        True if illuminance degree's correct. False if illuminance degree's incorrect.

      • displayArchangelInfo

        public void displayArchangelInfo(java.lang.String key)
        This method translates the size's number into String and prints the details of the archangel's related to the keyword.
        Post: The archangel's details were printed. An error is printed.
        Parameters:
        key. - A String containing either the name or the power of the archangel.

      • convertMonth

        public java.lang.String convertMonth(int month)
        This method converts a month from number to text.
        Pre:Month has to be a natural integer. Post:Month number is converted to its equivalent in text.
        Parameters:
        month. - Month number that'll be converted.
        Returns:
        The month in letters.

      • printDates

        public java.lang.String printDates(int decision,
                                   int month)
        This method concatenates the celebration dates based on the decision of the user.
        Post: The dates were concatenated in a String. No celebration dates were found between the month.
        Parameters:
        decision. - A number that decides which process is followed.
        month. - The month in number.
        Returns:
        The celebration dates in a String. An message notifying that no celebration were found within the month.
